content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</origin> <pubdate>20131201</pubdate> <title>NAIP 2013 Image Dates</title> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Salt Lake City, Utah</pubplace> <publish>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?webmap=8a786388f5a94e6ea883a31b0d39c42c</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>This map is produced by the Aerial Phtography Field Office (APFO) to show the image acquisition dates for the 2013 National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP) imagery.  The image dates are important to help the user determine what crops if any can be seen on the imagery.  This date index contains a polygon for each exposure used in the creation of the imagery.  To view the polygons for a particular state go to the boomark tab in the upper right of the map.  Once a state is chosen the view will zoom to the state and polygons will appear.  The image dates are a scale dependent layer both for performance and for a better user viewing experience.  Image acquistion date, color type, camera type, camera manufacturer, camera model, camera hardware and firmware versions, and aircraft type are the informational fields contained in the map.</abstract> <purpose>To provide information to the public about the collection, acquisition date and time, and general image collection information about NAIP imagery.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2013</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>2013</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Periodically during the flying season.</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-129.47</westbc> <eastbc>-64.56</eastbc> <northbc>51.26</northbc> <southbc>23.35</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>farming</themekey> <themekey>NAIP</themekey> <themekey>FSA</themekey> <themekey>Imagery</themekey> <themekey>Web Map</themekey> <themekey>APFO</themekey> <themekey>Acquisition</themekey> <themekey>Dates</themekey> <themekey>USDA</themekey> <themekey>Aerial Photography</themekey> <themekey>ArcGIS Online</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>Geographic Names Information System</placekt> <placekey>"United States"</placekey> <placekey>US</placekey> <placekey>North America</placekey> <placekey>State</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst> The map is for illustrative purposes only.  It is not suitable for legal, surveying or engineering purposes, The Aerial Photography Field Office asks to be credited for derived products. </useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/ArcGIS/rest/services/NAIP/NAIP_Image_Dates/MapServer</onlink> <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/ArcGIS/rest/services/Reference/USA_Base_Map/MapServer</onlink> <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/arcgis/rest/services/NAIP</onlink> <onlink>http://services.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Physical_Map/MapServer</onlink> <onlink>http://services.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Topo_Map/MapServer</onlink> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>10</srcscale> <typesrc>Digital Map, digital vector map service, digital image services, digital base map tiled service</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2013</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>NAIP imagery program 2013 acquisition status, NAIP image services - latest edition, ESRI World Physical Base Map - latest edition, ESRI World Topographic Base Map - latest edition.</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>N/A</srccitea> <srccontr>APFO NAIP Image Dates ArcGIS Server Map Service, USA Base Map APFO ArcGIS Server Map Service, ESRI World Physcal Base Map available on ArcGIS Online</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>This ArcGIS Online digital map was created on the FSA organizational subscription by adding the NAIP Image Dates, and USA Base Map ArcGIS server map services, and the 2013 NAIP ArcGIS Server image services into the ArcGIS Online map viewer window.  The ESRI World Physical, and Topographic basemaps were added as basemaps.</procdesc> <procdate>20131201</procdate> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>"US",</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <rastinfo> <rasttype>Pixel</rasttype> </rastinfo> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn>WGS 84 Web Mercator Auxiliary Sphere</mapprojn> <mapprojp></mapprojp> </mapproj> <planci> <plance>coordinate pair</plance> <coordrep> <absres>0.1</absres> <ordres>0.1</ordres> </coordrep> <plandu>meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>WGS 84</horizdn> <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips> <semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis> <denflat>298.257</denflat> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover> The NAIP Image Dates layer contains the following fields and attributes -  OBJECTID - Unique Identifier IDATE - Image acquisition date SDATE - Polygon start date/time EDATE - Polygon end date/time BCON - Color type CAM_TYPE - Camera type CAM_MAN - Camera manufacturer CAM_MOD - Camera model HARD_FIRM - Camera Hardware/Firmware version SENSNUM - Sensor or lens serial number AC_TYPE - Aircraft type ACTAILNUM - Aircraft tail number  These layers are scale dependent.  User must check them on in the table of contents and zoom to the state extent and the polygons will appear.  USA Base Map provides the following informational layers:  Cities, Transportation, Topographic map indices, Land management, USA boundaries, and Water.  The following NAIP image services are contained in the map: Alabama, Arkansas, Colorado, Delaware, Georgia, Idaho, Iowa, Maine, Maryland, Minnesota, Montana, Nevada, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Washington, and Wisconsin. These image services contain the following fields and attributes:  OBJECTID - Unique Identifier Name - Image file name Category - Type of dataset 1 indicates primary base data Year_ts - Image year ST - State postal abbreviation QQNAME - Quarter Quad name QQDATE - The date of the Quarter Quad iDate_ts - Catalog date </eaover> <eadetcit>The attribute values for the NAIP 2013 Image Dates map service were obtained from the current NAIP contract specifications.  The attribute values for the NAIP image services were obtained from the ArcGIS Server REST endpoint.</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>APFO Sales Department</cntper> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>apfo.sales@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>ArcGIS Online Web Map</resdesc> <distliab> In no event shall the creators, custodians, or distributors of this information be liable for any damages arising out of its use (or the inability to use it). </distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>ArcGIS Online Web Map, ESRI ArcGIS Server Map Service, ESRI ArcGIS Server Image Services, ESRI ArcGIS Tiled Services.</formname> <formcont>N/A</formcont> </digtinfo> <digtopt> <onlinopt> <computer> <networka> <networkr>http://www.arcgis.com/home/item.html?id=8a786388f5a94e6ea883a31b0d39c42c</networkr> </networka> </computer> </onlinopt> <offoptn> <offmedia>N/A</offmedia> <recfmt>N/A</recfmt> </offoptn> </digtopt> </digform> <fees>N/A</fees> </stdorder> </distinfo> <metainfo> <metd>20140324</metd> <metc> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>joan.biediger@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </metc> <metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn> <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv> </metainfo> </metadata>
